column4: is there something to make a website displaying my music collection, using Amarok/DB ?
its not there if you did a new install
there is an example <Directory> configuration for musicindex in the README.gz (/usr/share/doc/libapache*musicindex*...)
its complex, there are commands to enable sites and modules -- a2ensite, a2dissite, a2enmod, a2dismod -- enable, disable..
its more than that, for sure
make your music config in /etc/apache2/sites-available/music; a2ensite music ; invoke-rc.d apache2 reload
u lost me at the first one....
the /etc/*-(enabled|disabled) are for quickly having sites and modules enabled
yeah, sorry, you gotta make a file
the Alias /mp3 /path/to/your/mp3s will make apache read /path/to/your/mp3s when you hit http://your-server/mp3
